description: Unique identifier for this contact–craft assignment record; used as the primary key.
Identifier of the person/technician associated with the craft; references the contact master.
Identifier of the craft/skill/trade assigned to the contact; references craft master used for labor classification and rates.
Boolean flag indicating whether this is the contact’s primary craft.
Optional hourly rate override for this contact when working under this craft instead of the default craft rate; likely used for costing/billing; confirm with SME.
Free-text notes about the contact’s association with the craft (e.g., qualifications, limits).
System timestamp of the most recent change to this record.
Legacy audit timestamp of the last user-driven update; likely duplicates the system-modified time; confirm with SME.
Timestamp when the record was created.
Username/login that last updated the record.
Timestamp of the most recent update to the record.
